channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster Restarts Get Faster
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: MySQL Cluster Data Node restart times @ Andrew Morgan’s MySQL Cluster Database Blog
item.dc:creator: MySQL Cluster Data Node restart times @ Andrew Morgan’s MySQL Cluster Database Blog
item.description: [...] Restart times have been reduced in MySQL Cluster 6.3.28a & 7.0.9a – refer to that article for the new timings: /mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-restarts-get-faster/ [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Restart times have been reduced in MySQL Cluster 6.3.28a & 7.0.9a – refer to that article for the new timings: /mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-restarts-get-faster/ […]
